QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: type
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Pick the type of a payload, installed on a Vehicle.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: cameraType
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Pick the type of a camera, installed on a Vehicle.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: cameraIpPort
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP and PORT of a chosen camera's UDP control. e.g. 192.168.144.25:37260

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: cameraMaxZoom
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Max Zoom camera can zoom in

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: enableGimbalControl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: User can pick if they want to control camera's gimbal using GUI.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: isCameraResponding
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Shows if camera is online or not.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: READ ONLY indicator if camera is responding to the requests.
